# Grandmother's War Story

| runtime        = 995 ft
| country        = United States
| language       = Silent film(English intertitles)
| budget         =
| gross          =
}}
'Grandmother's War Story' is an American silent film produced by Kalem Company and directed by Sidney Olcott with Gene Gauntier and Jack J. Clark.
Cast
* Gene Gauntier
* Jack J. Clark
Production notes
The film was shot in Jacksonville, Florida.
References
External links
*
* [http://www.sidneyolcott.com/Grandmother's_War_Story.htm ''Grandmother's War Story''] website dedicated to Sidney Olcott
